categories.name: Antifouling & Coatings
categories.description: Bottom paints, primers, and topcoats for local waters.

products.title: Jotun SeaForce 2.5L Black / Noir
products.description:
This is a one component acrylic, hydrolysing antifouling coating based on hydractive technology. It provides
good fouling protection. This is achieved through self polishing low friction characteristics reducing hull
deterioration. To be used as finish coat in immersed environments only. Suitable on approved primers and tie
coats on aluminium and carbon steel substrates. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: Jotun SeaForce 04L Blue / Bleu
products.description:
This is a one component acrylic, hydrolysing antifouling coating based on hydractive technology. It provides
good fouling protection. This is achieved through self polishing low friction characteristics reducing hull
deterioration. To be used as finish coat in immersed environments only. Suitable on approved primers and tie
coats on aluminium and carbon steel substrates. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: JOTUN Safeguard universal es 15L(A)+03L(B)
products.description:
This is a two component polyamide cured vinyl epoxy based coating. Specially designed as a tie coat between
epoxy primers and antifouling systems. Can be used as tie coat / holding primer for a wide range of topcoats. To
be used as tie coat in atmospheric and immersed environments. Suitable on approved primers on aluminium,
carbon steel, galvanised and stainless steel substrates. It can be applied at sub zero surface temperatures

products.title: Penguard Primer Red / Rouge 04L(A)+01L(B)
products.description:
This is a two component, polyamide cured, high molecular weight epoxy coating. It has a semi gloss finish with
fair gloss retention. Can be used as primer, finish coat or as single coat system in atmospheric environments or
as a final coat in immersed environment. To be used as topcoat in atmospheric and immersed environments.
